name: Personal records
description: Your birth certificate, ID card, and other personal records confirm who you are. They help you get the services you need.
metaDescription: Browse California state services related to personal records

popularServices.Description: Get a birth certificate for proof of citizenship, social security, passport, and more.
popularServices.imgAlt: birth certificate

popularServices.Description: Change your address for your driver’s license, identification card, vehicle, or vessel.
popularServices.imgAlt: post box next to a house

popularServices.Description: Show proof of your vaccinations with digital vaccine records.
popularServices.imgAlt: Mobile phone with a digital vaccine record barcode on the screen

popularServices.Description: Get an official death certificate copy for benefits, insurance claims, and legal needs.
popularServices.imgAlt: Flowers on a grave site with a headstone in the background

name: Businesses
description: California offers support for your business through licensing, permitting, verificati on, and more.
metaDescription: Browse California state services that support businesses

popularServices.Description: Register online for a California business license, permit, or account.
popularServices.imgAlt: Woman looking on a laptop screen

popularServices.Description: Register online for a seller's permit, required for sales subject to sales tax.
popularServices.imgAlt: man and woman doing seller's permit paperwork

popularServices.ServiceName: Get a fishing or hunting license
popularServices.Description: Get information for how you can buy a fishing or hunting license in person or online.
popularServices.imgAlt: Fishing boat on a lake hauling fish inside the net

popularServices.Description: Locate unclaimed property that  has been sent to the state for safekeeping.
popularServices.imgAlt: Man holding a check with some money amount on it

name: DMV/Auto
description: Get your California driver’s license, registration, and insurance up-to-date. Resolve traffic tickets, and keep your vehicle in shape with smog and repair services.
metaDescription: Browse California state services related to vehicles and the DMV

popularServices.Description: Find the appropriate county traffic court to pay or challenge your ticket.
popularServices.imgAlt: Traffic ticket on the windshield of a car

popularServices.Description: Search for a smog station by location and service type, including STAR inspections.
popularServices.imgAlt: Machanic and customer doing handshake in front of a car

popularServices.Description: Skip the line and renew your driver’s license or identification card online. Your address must be up-to-date to renew.
popularServices.imgAlt: Young woman getting her driver's license from a DMV officer

popularServices.Description: Get auto insurance at low cost, affordable rates. To qualify, you must be income-eligible with a good driving record.
popularServices.imgAlt: Auto keys with a car keychain

name: Jobs and unemployment
description: Browse job boards and employment resources, including job training. Get financial support while you are unemployed.
metaDescription: Browse California state services related to employment

popularServices.Description: Learn more about jobs with the State, look at job openings and apply for jobs with the state of California.
popularServices.imgAlt: CalCareers logo

popularServices.Description: File and manage unemployment claims on a fast, convenient, and secure platform.
popularServices.imgAlt: person filing for unemployment benefits on a computer

popularServices.Description: Find job openings and information about applying for jobs in California.
popularServices.imgAlt: Young man getting interview for a job

popularServices.Description: Apply for short-term benefits, available to eligible workers who need time off work.
popularServices.imgAlt: Woman applying for disability benefits on a computer

name: Assistance and social programs
description: Get help covering food, medical, vehicle, and education costs. Apply for income assistance when unemployed or on disability.
metaDescription: Browse California state services that provide social and financial help

popularServices.Description: Add to your food budget and get help putting healthy food on the table with the CalFresh Program.
popularServices.imgAlt: Father and son shopping for groceries in a supermarket

popularServices.Description: Get free or low-cost medical care. Medi-Cal provides health coverage for qualified individuals.
popularServices.imgAlt: Mother with child seeing a lady doctor in a hospital

popularServices.Description: File and manage unemployment claims on a fast, convenient, and secure platform.
popularServices.imgAlt: A person applying for unemployment benefits on a computer

popularServices.ServiceName: Get a CalABLE Visa prepaid card
popularServices.Description: Pay for disability-related expenses tax free with a CalABLE card.
popularServices.imgAlt: CalABLE Visa prepaid card

name: Housing and real estate
description: Manage your home with contractors, real estate agents, appraisers and insurance estimates. Maintain your real estate business with licensing.
metaDescription: Browse California state services related to housing and real estate.

popularServices.Description: Look up a contractor license to verify information, including complaint disclosure.
popularServices.imgAlt: Blueprints on the table and three construction workers discussing the plan on the background

popularServices.Description: Check the status of a real estate licensee using a name, address, or license ID.
popularServices.imgAlt: Realor lady holding open house sign in front of a house

popularServices.Description: Get an earthquake insurance premium estimate for your residence.

popularServices.Description: Check the status of your submitted COVID-19 rent relief application.
popularServices.imgAlt: Family of four standing in front of a house

name: Safety and emergencies
description: Look up public safety information and receive support if you are a victim of a crime or disaster.
metaDescription: Browse California state services related to public safety and disaster assistance

popularServices.Description: Check the database to get information about registered sex offenders by location.
popularServices.imgAlt: Person searching for registered sex offenders on a computer

popularServices.Description: Search for information about inmates in custody, including location and admission date.
popularServices.imgAlt: Open map with a location pin on top of the computer

popularServices.Description: Access disaster relief services and tips on ensuring your health and safety.
popularServices.imgAlt: Disaster relief worker helping a woman

popularServices.ServiceName: Apply for compensation for crime-related expenses
popularServices.Description: Are you a victim of crime? CalVCB can help with bills and expenses that result from crime.

name: State info and laws
description: Look up state representatives and laws. Access other state data, like lottery numbers, local schools, and voter registration.

name: Taxes
description: Learn about taxes in California and how to file for free, check your refund, and earn tax credits.
metaDescription: Browse California state services related to taxes, refunds, and credits

popularServices.Description: You may be able to get a tax refund if you’ve paid too much tax. Use this service to check your refund status.
popularServices.imgAlt: Man in glasses looking at a mobile phone screen

popularServices.ServiceName: File taxes for free with CalFile
popularServices.Description: Use CalFile to e-file your state tax return. Get real-time confirmation and the fastest refund possible. And best of all, it’s free.
popularServices.imgAlt: Elderly couple filing taxes on a mobile phone

popularServices.Description: Enter an address to find the sales and use tax rate for that location.
popularServices.imgAlt: Person with calulator and pen in front of a computer screen

popularServices.ServiceName: Learn about the Earned Income Tax Credit
popularServices.Description: The CalEITC is a state tax credit for working Californians. If you qualify, you may see a reduced tax bill or a bigger refund.
popularServices.imgAlt: EITC logo
